源匯.definition: Yuanhui district of Luohe city 漯河市[Luo4 he2 shi4], Henan

源匯區.definition: Yuanhui district of Luohe city 漯河市[Luo4 he2 shi4], Henan

源城.definition: Yuancheng district of Heyuan city 河源市[He2 yuan2 shi4], Guangdong

源城區.definition: Yuancheng district of Heyuan city 河源市[He2 yuan2 shi4], Guangdong

源氏物語.definition: The Tale of Genji, classic Japanese novel by Murasaki Shikibu (c. 11th century)

源泉.definition: fountainhead; well-spring; water source; fig. origin

源流.definition: (of watercourses) source and course; origin and development

源源本本.definition: variant of 原原本本[yuan2 yuan2 ben3 ben3]

源賴朝.definition: MINAMOTO no Yoritomo (1147-1199), Japanese warlord and founder of the Kamakura shogunate 鐮倉幕府|镰仓幕府[Lian2 cang1 mu4 fu3]

源遠流長.definition: lit. source is distant and the flow is long (idiom); fig. sth goes back to the dim and distant past; a lot of water has flowed under the bridge since then
